Write a short story or poem about the sun forgetting to rise and the consequences it has on the world below.
Create a painting or illustration depicting the sun not rising over a cityscape.
Write a scientific explanation of why the sun might not rise on certain days, such as during a solar eclipse or at the North Pole.
Write a thought-provoking essay on the symbolism of the sun and its connection to the concept of time and mortality.
Create a series of memes or cartoons that poke fun at the idea of people being jealous of others' accomplishments.
